title: How do you pick your mana item?
body:
I never know if I should choose morello, RoA, Athene, Muramana, Archangel's or two dorans (and sell them later).

Except when it's in the recommended items. Even then I want to experiment a bit but I don't know what the differences are exactly.

Also, I never start with Dorans and instead go boots, faerie charms, mana/health crystals or tome instead.


Stupid downvoters not even giving a good reason

replies.body:
Tear is better vs AD's because you can pick up the nifty shield and going Unholy Grail is a complete waste.
Morello's is good for healers, however it's a CDR go to item for if Unholy Grail is useless and I wouldn't waste my money on it if the Magic resist wasn't helping me or I needed Heal shred.
Catalyst is a great option if you want to tank up (Think, Morgana/Cho) - it counters burst and can also allow you to go for huge engages (Like with Annie and Morg) - and is either an alternative to Zhonya's (You can have Rod of Ages long before a Zhonya's allowing for early diving etc) or can synergize with Zhonya's but keep in mind it's a bit of a trap build because you miss out on ludens or deathcap which are big damage - the catalyst is good for lane staying power however Rod has sort of bad synergies right now (Coupled with a few trash tier items you get stuck in bad build paths and it doesn't synergize with the burstier items like Luden's and Deathcap).

Also Tear is great on Cassiopeia and is almost a necessity because you run out of mana in 0.2 seconds.

I take Rod on Ahri sometimes if I'm versing burst or True damage (Flat HP is great verse true damage) but I wont take it if they have % HP damage (basically wasted) I take morellos most of the time (heal shred on carry if I don't have ignite as they're my main target plus I can heal shred their heal target 2) and Grail if I can't farm and am versing MR - or I will grab grail if I can farm and just need the magic resist (Ahri has no Magic resist gains per level, keeping only base MR and that from runes so she tends to be susceptible to AP burst) and I take Tear on her if I'm versing a decent AD mid.

Double Doran's really doesn't cover your mana requirements.

Double dorans is good for non-spam assassins like LB who can use the extra mana to get their combo out early game.

Tear isn't only necessary for Cass, it's a must for Ryze, Anivia, Singed and Swain too.

Morello is the "normal" choice
Athenes if you need the MR
Archangels if you have a toggle ability or spam your abilities (singed/anivia/cassiopeia/ryze etc)
RoA if you want the added tankiness

Double Dorans is the poor mans build usually. If you are forced back with 500 or so gold.

Depending on who you are playing, starting boots/tome/mana crystal isn't the worst. (ryze/akali/katarina/rumble)
But i'd never recommend starting faerie charm.

for just 400 gold extra, any ap mid laner should always get athenes in norms/solo q over morello. it gives SO MUCH more mana, a good amount of MR and just 20 less AP than morello. you can never know if you get blue buff (unless you do know lol) but even then being pretty much rewarded for spamming your abilities is great and can only benefit your damage output and wave clear. roa got changed to give more mana and AP but less health, so in non-lcs games you might not last as long in teamfights/regular play to use that additional mana, so in a way you might wanna only get it on annie swain maokai and most seraphs users, otherwise it might not be worth it, especially since the CDR on mages is so much more valuable

There are some champions that I get Athenes no matter the matchup (Ziggs and Orianna). Becuase of this reason. My answer was just a general response. I feel like Morello is more efficient item on most people than Athenes if you have mana control
I start faerie charm with Veigar for his passive, instead of mana crystal, then buy the rest as HP pots and have a lot of sustain

Pretty much this. I'd also add that double dorans is useful if you're against an AD assassin like zed and need to rush seekers armguard to avoid dying, or if you're rushing ludens or some other non mana regen item. Also athenes is more standard than morello on more mana hungry champs unless you really need the grievous wounds or the MR is useless.

Also try flask+pots if you're that adamant about not starting dorans (though dorans is usually the best unless you suck at last hitting)
